Package org.apache.maven.plugin.cxx

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractCxxMojo
    Base class with shared configuration for cxx mojo.
    AbstractLaunchMojo
    Common mojo stuff to launch external tools
    AbstractPerformBranchReleaseMojo
    Branch a project in SCM
    AddSourceMojo
    Add more source directories to the POM.
    CMakeMojo
    Goal which cmakes workspace.
    CoverageMojo
    Goal which gcovr execution.
    CppCheckMojo
    Goal which cppcheck sources.
    CppNcssMojo
    Goal which cppncss sources.
    GenerateMojo
    Generates a new project from an archetype, or updates the actual project if using a partial archetype.
    HelpMojo
    Display help information on cxx-maven-plugin.
    LaunchMojo
    Goal which Launch an external executable.
    MakeMojo
    Goal which makes workspace.
    PerformBranchMojo
    Branch a project in SCM
    PerformReleaseMojo
    Branch a project in SCM
    QMakeMojo
    Goal which qmakes workspace.
    ScmDependenciesMojo
    Goal that retrieve source dependencies from the SCM.
    UnpackDependenciesMojo
    Goal that unpacks the project dependencies from the repository to a defined location.
    ValgrindMojo
    Goal which valgrind executables.
    VeraxxMojo
    Goal which vera++ check sources.
    VisualStudioMojo
    Goal which build VisualStudio solutions.
    XUnitMojo
    Goal which launch unit test using a custom command.
